CustomField.description: Order Type showed to the user (with 'Renewal' instead of 'Upgrade - Partner App' and 'Upgrade' instead of 'Upgrade - Org Edition')
CustomField.formula: IF(Text(CHANNEL_ORDERS__Order_Type__c) == "Upgrade - Partner App", "Renewal", IF(Text(CHANNEL_ORDERS__Order_Type__c) == "Upgrade - Org Edition", "Upgrade", Text(CHANNEL_ORDERS__Order_Type__c)))
CustomField.label: Order Type
